ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: so that they will understand my words.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That they may understand my speech,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: so that they may understand my speech;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: so that they may understand me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “In order that they may understand my speech.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: hat they may understand my words.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That they may understand my saying.

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [so that] they may understand my speech.

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:28] so that they may understand what I [shall] say, when I am delivering the Message.
